com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.discovery

Class AbstractDeviceDiscoverer<Space,Device extends RemoteBluetoothDevice,Filter extends com.android.internal.util.Predicate<Device>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.discovery.AbstractDeviceDiscoverer<Space,Device,Filter>
  • Type Parameters:
    Space - Space type parameter which the discovered devices belong to
    Device - Bluetooth device type parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothDeviceDiscoverer, ShuffledDevicesResolver.ResolveCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EddystoneDiscoverer, IBeaconDiscoverer

    public abstract class AbstractDeviceDiscoverer<Space,Device extends RemoteBluetoothDevice,Filter extends com.android.internal.util.Predicate<Device>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BluetoothDeviceDiscoverer, ShuffledDevicesResolver.ResolveCallback
    Abstraction for Bluetooth device discoverers in the SDK. The abstraction provides convenient interface whenever you need to implement your own Bluetooth device discoverer.

      • evictInactiveDevices

        public void evictInactiveDevices(long currentTimeMillis)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothDeviceDiscoverer
        Evicts inactive devices. The device undergoes eviction if Android device has not received signal from the remote device for the time period specified by ActivityCheckConfiguration.getInactivityTimeout()
        Specified by:
        evictInactiveDevices in interface BluetoothDeviceDiscoverer
